1.「キハダさんっ。まだ 間に合います。| やめるなんて言わずに もう一度| 考え直: Yellowfin... It's not too late... Don't tell|me you're quitting. Please reconsider!

2.「げーっ また来たのかよ アンタ……。| うるせえなぁ。おれっちは| もう 木工: Geez, you're back again... Shut up... I'm not|interested in being a woodworker anymore!

3.「郷里のお母さまが ご病気で| お金が必要だったのは わかります……。: I understand your mother was ill in your|hometown and you needed money...

4.「でも うちに入門するとき 世界一の| 木工職人になって お城に 家具を献上する:
But when you first joined us, you said your|dream was to become the world's greatest|woodworker and present furniture to the|
|castle!

5.「よう 邪魔するぜ キハダさん。| 金が返せねぇなら もういいかげん| こっちに: Hey, you interrupting me, Kiha... If you|can't return the money, then let's have your|body here for good...

6.「うっ！ デュバルさん……。| わかりました……。今 行きます。: Ugh! Mr. Duvall... Yes, sir... I'm coming...

7.「待って！ あなたたちは どなたです？| うちの職人を どこへ連れていく気ですか: Wait! Who are you people? Where are you|taking our craftsmen?

8.「もう いいんだ カンナさん……。| 夢じゃ 食っていけねぇんだ。: It's okay, Kanna... I can't live on dreams...

9.「ごちゃごちゃ言ってねーで 早く来い！| テメーらみたいな カビくせぇ木工職人じ: Stop messing around and come quick! A bunch|of moldy woodworkers like you can't even pay|the interest!

11.「カビくさい……だと？| ちょっと 聞き捨てならない言葉だね！！: It's musty. What? I don't like the sound of|that!

12.「……アタシは 素材にも 道具にも| カビなんて生やさせたこたぁ ありゃしないよ: ... I've never let mold grow on my materials|or tools. I'm a proud craftsman.

13.「アンタらこそ 今 自分のやってることに| 誇りが あるってのかい！？| 胸張っ: Are you guys proud of what you're doing right|now? Are you doing your job with pride? Huh?

14.「キハダ！ アンタもアンタだよ！| 借金が苦しいからって 一度抱いた夢を| 捨て: Kihada! You're just like me! You're a|pathetic man who throws away a dream he once|had just because he's in debt!

16.「ちょ……ちょっと アニキ！| ツバクロのアニキ～！！: Hey... Hey, Aniki! Mr. Tsubakuro's brother!

17.「なんじゃ 騒がしいのぅ。| オメーらで ちーたぁ片付けぇや……。: What's with all the noise... Why don't you|guys clean up your own mess...

18.「ん んん！？| ……もしや お嬢？ お嬢じゃろか？: Hmmm? Hmmm... Is that you, miss? Miss, is it?

19.「おや 誰かと思ったら ツバクロじゃないか。| ひさしぶりだね。: Oh, look who's here. It's Tsubakuro... It's|been a while.

20.「フン……。一文無しで じいさんに拾われて| ギルドの 使い走りしてたアンタが:
Hmm... You were penniless, your grandfather|took you in, you were running errands for the|guild, and now you're posing as a big shot in|
|some weird business...

21.「まぁいいさ。アンタなら 話が早いよ。| これ 受け取ってくんな！ その代わり|: Well... I'm sure you can... Don't take this!|In exchange, I'll clear your debt to|Kihada...

22.「こ……こりゃ スミツボのオヤジさんが| 大事にしとった 家宝の木工刀じゃろ！？:
This... This must be the family heirloom|wooden sword, treasured by the old man of|Sumitsubo! I can't accept something as|
|valuable as this!

23.「今のアタシにとって 門弟よか| 大事なモンなんて ないんでね。| じいさんも: There's nothing more important to me now than|my pupil... I'm sure Grandpa will understand.

25.「まったく お嬢には かなわんのぉ。| ……ほいじゃ こりゃあ| わしが いっと: You're no match for her... Well... Well,|then, I'll be your guest for a while...

27.「キハダ！ そこの <pc>だって| イチから コツコツ がんばってんだよ。: Yellowfin! There.<pc> You know, you start from scratch, work your|way up...

28.「もう <color_yellow><%sEV_SYOK_HOSI><color: more<color_yellow><%sEV_SYOK_HOSI><color_white>I've grown up to be able to make|<%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>... You should start working|on yours tomorrow!

29.「お嬢……。まるで スミツボのオヤジさんが| 生き返ったかのようじゃったわ……。: Miss... It was as if the old man with the|dart had come back to life.

30.「キハダさん。アンタのこたぁ 目をつむるけぇ| 木工ギルドで働ける 幸せをかみし:
Kiha... I'm going to turn a blind eye to what|you're doing, so you should just work hard|and savor the happiness of working for the|
|Woodworkers Guild...
